price: 11. Hoewel zij elkaar kunnen zien, - de misdadiger wil zichzelf vrijkopen van de bestraffing van die dag door zijn kinderen.
arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yubaṣṣarūnahum yawaddu al-muj'rimu law yaftadī min ʿadhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīhi
translations: They will be made to see each other
